description: Adds a Control or Module Repository to the Continuous Delivery for PE account.

email.description: The email address associated with the account.

password.description: The password associated with the account.

workspace.description: Designates the workspace that the control or module repository will be created in

repo_provider.description: The repository provider. Must be one of 'github', 'gitlab', 'githubEnterprise', 'bitbucketServer', 'bitbucket' (for Bitbucket Cloud), or 'azureDevOps'.

source_repo_org.description: The organization associated with the repository.

source_repo_name.description: The name of the source repository.

source_repo_branch.description: The default branch to use for the repository.

repo_name.description: Optional. The friendly name to use for the repository as referenced in Continous Delivery For PE. Defaults to 'source_repo_name'.

repo_type.description: The type of repository to create. Must be one of 'control' or 'module'.

resolvable_hostname.description: A resolvable internet address where the Continuous Delivery for PE server can be reached. Required only if the agent certificate is not the machine's resolvable internet address.

web_ui_endpoint.description: The endpoint where the web UI can be reached, in the form http://<resolvable_hostname>:<port>. Required if you set the web_ui_port parameter in the cd4pe class during installation.
